testcase.name: Sign in
testcase.system-out: Given the tester is on the sign in page.....................................passed When tester clicks on sign in link..........................................passed And the tester enters firstname as "Aditi"..................................passed And the tester enters lastname as "Kadu"....................................passed And the tester inputs email address as "adt16aug@gmail.com".................passed And the tester enters username as "adielearn95".............................passed And the tester inputs password as "adi1234".................................passed And the tester re-enters password as "adi1234".............................passed And the tester clicks on Register button....................................passed And the tester should see the message as Dear ADITI KADU....................passed And the tester clicks on dropdown menu in top right corner..................passed And the tester clicks on inbox link.........................................passed And the tester clicks on Compose icon.......................................passed And the tester enters "naveen naveen (naveen)" in sent to field.............passed And the tester enters the subject field as "Hi For Testing".................passed And the tester enters the message...........................................passed And the tester clicks on send message button................................passed Then the tester can see the acknowledgement of message send.................passed
